analysis.description:
PickflixGameMaster.sendTo (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1044-1050) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _payee.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1048)

PickflixGameFactory.sendOraclePayout (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oracleFeeReceiver.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol)

PickflixGameMaster.killGame (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1219-1225) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == token.totalSupply())

Reentrancy in PickflixGameFactory.killGame (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol):
	External calls:
	- PickflixGameMaster(gameMaster).killGame(gameTokens[gameMaster]) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- games (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol)
	- games (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol)

PickflixGameMaster.redeemTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1052-1090) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transferFrom(_player,address(this),_allowedValue) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1069-1071)

PickflixGameMaster.killGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1224-1225)

PickflixGameMaster.killGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.kill() (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1225)

Reentrancy in PickflixGameMaster.abortGame (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1174-1219):

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#777-787) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,The Crowdsale must not start in the past) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#779-783)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,The Crowdsale must not start in the past)

analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#801-814) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#812-814)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#821-824) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#823)

PickflixGameMaster.redeemTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1052-1090) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= closeDate,Game must be closed) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1055-1056)

PickflixGameMaster.calculateGameResults (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1142-1173) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= closeDate,Game must have ended before results can be entered) (/unique_chucks/13/0x34f416364f52d6753aee14f2687726705039c2b5.sol#1153-1156)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= closeDate,Game must have ended before results can be entered)
